snippet.title: A Dragon's Tale: Fading Light Announcement Trailer (Upcoming Indie Game)
snippet.description:
Hi everyone! 
I'm Fabian Kopetzky and I'm excited to share that my indie game that has been in development for the last two years is now coming to Steam soon!

You can follow the development on Instagram and Discord, and if you are interested, wishlist the game on Steam. That would help me out immensly :)

⏩ Links
➡ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2564240/A_Dragons_Tale_Fading_Light/
➡ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fabiankopetzky_games/
➡ Discord: https://discord.gg/xFbYqGaWdu

⏩ About the game
Embark on a journey as a small dragon across enchanting worlds, find runes with arcane powers and learn many powerful abilities. Master them to solve puzzles, defeat mighty enemies and eventually face the Black Dragon in this unique action-platformer! 

⏩ Explore a magical world full of secrets, puzzles and enemies!
The Black Dragon, a mighty creature from the Shadow Realm devours the light of the island. Embark on a journey across 6 enchanting worlds, learn powerful abilities and stop its evil forces! "A Dragon's Tale: Fading Light" is a unique action platformer with various RPG elements such as a skill-tree and leveling-system. The abilities can be combined in unique ways by the player to solve challenging puzzles, do platforming or to battle enemies & mighty bosses.
